ref.mixed-citation: Collins M, Knutti R, Arblaster J, Dufresne J-L, Fichefet T, Friedlingstein P, Gao X, Gutowski, WJ, Johns T, Krinner G, Shongwe M, Tebaldi C, Weaver AJ, Wehner M.
